thread.title_full: Viewers mock Sheridan Smith‚Äôs attempt at a Yorkshire accent in BBC‚Äôs Shannon Matthews drama Moorside despite ‚Äòamazing‚Äô performance

author: rpocklington
title: Viewers mock Sheridan Smith‚Äôs attempt at a Yorkshire accent in BBC‚Äôs Shannon Matthews drama Moorside despite ‚Äòamazing‚Äô performance
text:
Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments VIEWERS of the BBC‚Äôs Shannon Matthews drama Moorside have mocked Sheridan Smith and her co-stars‚Äô Yorkshire accents, despite praising their ‚Äúamazing‚Äù performances. 
The two-part series follows the story of missing Shannon, who was drugged and hidden under a bed by her mother Karen Matthews in a bid to claim the reward money for her return. 2 The Moorside has been praised for being the ‚Äúbest show of 2017‚Äù 
It has an all star cast of Sheridan , Downton Abbey‚Äôs Siobhan Finnerean and Game of Thrones star Gemma Whelan, who plays mum Karen. 
And while fans praised the show as a whole, many were baffled by the accents. 
One Twitter user wrote: ‚ÄúIs Sheridan meant to be doing a Yorkshire accent? It‚Äôs just she sounds a little like she‚Äôs from Carlisle.‚Äù 
While another added: ‚ÄúYou just can‚Äôt fake a Yorkshire accent #Moorside.‚Äù 
And one wrote: ‚ÄúSheridan‚Äôs Dewbury accent wasn‚Äôt up to much was it #Moorside.‚Äù Is Sheridan meant to be doing a Yorkshire accent? It's just she sounds a little like she's from Carlisle. #Moorside 
‚Äî Adam Wray (@AdamWray2) February 7, 2017 You just can't fake a Yorkshire accent üòÇ #moorside 
‚Äî kingfisher karl (@kingfisherkarl) February 7, 2017 Sheridan's Dewbury accent wasn't up to much was it #Moorside 
‚Äî Sam Hall (@Sam_T_Hall) February 7, 2017 
However plenty more praised the star as one wrote: ‚ÄúWatching Moorside Sheridan Smith is bloody awesome at anything she does including a Yorkshire accent.‚Äù 
The Moorside retells the harrowing story of the manhunt from the perspective of the friends of Karen Matthews. 
Sheridan plays the leading lady of neighbour Julie Bushby, the chair of the Moorside residents and tenants association that helped trace Shannon. 
The show immediately had viewers gripped, with fans taking to Twitter to praise the drama and its actors. PA:Press Association Sheridan gave a moving performance Watch Sheridan Smith shine in new BBC drama The Moorside 
They were also impressed by the sensitivity that was taken in portraying such an emotional story that had gripped the nation. 
One Twitter user wrote: "Sheridan Smith is absolutely amazing!!" 
And one added: "This Shannon Matthews drama is utterly bizarre. Sheridan Smith amazing as per." Sheridan Smith is absolutely amazing!!üëè‚ù§Ô∏è #Moorside #loveit 
‚Äî Charlotte Sleight (@Charlet_Sleight) February 7, 2017 This Shannon Matthews drama is utterly bizarre. Sheridan Smith amazing as per. 
‚Äî Rachel Hawkins (@ourrachblogs) February 7, 2017 this is without doubt the best drama of 2017 so far. #themoorside 
‚Äî Andi McLellan (@AndiMcLellan) February 7, 2017 Sheridan Smith and Gemma Whelan on #TheMoorside are outstanding. Despite the horrific story, I am really enjoying their performances. 
‚Äî Olivia Riley (@OHelenRiley) February 7, 2017 
One fan said: "This is without doubt the best drama of 2017 so far. #themoorside" 
Another commented: "#TheMoorside has been excellent. Great acting from #SheridanSmith as always, and a sensitive portrayal of the local community." 
This one tweeted: "Sheridan Smith and Gemma Whelan on #TheMoorside are outstanding. Despite the horrific story, I am really enjoying their performances."
